name: True Link
headline: Financial Services for Financial Caregivers.
description:
True Link exists to provide life-changing financial solutions for people with complex needs and the people who care for them. We founded the company to make life better for our own loved ones, and we’re honored to serve vulnerable elders, people with disabilities, and people in recovery – and their families and professional caregivers – day in and day out.

We’re a caring, diverse, values-driven company, with customers who say things like, “Your company saved my marriage,” “If not for True Link my Son would have returned to substance use,” and “This is the single best product I have ever experienced.” We’re a fast-growing fintech startup that also gets to provide our customers a life-changing solution to some of the most deeply personal, important problems in their lives.

founders.name: Claire McDonnell, Founder/COO
founders.description: I build products and organizations that solve important problems in the world. I’ve scaled True Link from two co-founders to 100+ people, from seed stage to $70M+ raised, from ramen noodles to profitable. As COO and President, I’ve led the Product, Engineering, Design, Sales, Marketing, Success, and Support functions for 10 years with an average of 80%+ growth per year and a net promoter score of 80.

For Families and Professionals
# The True Link Visa® Prepaid Card
Send money, help protect spending, track purchases, get real-time alerts, and more.
[Sign up](https://www.truelinkfinancial.com/<https:/member.truelinkfinancial.com/signups/card/new/survey/entry>)[Request a demo](https://www.truelinkfinancial.com/</demo>)
**250,000+** Families served
**$175 Million** Fraud prevented yearly*
**300+** Nonprofits served**
**97%** Of clients would recommend us
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61000b6dd512bb24bee0534c/66a8f93063f58787adadddde_Group%208534%402x.png)
## Customizable spending rules
Set where and how the Visa card can be used to make purchases to help protect spending and help prevent fraud.
[Learn more about True Link for families](https://www.truelinkfinancial.com/</families>)
“
> Your card has been a godsend for me; it’s been a very positive addition to our lives. Everything is easy to use and you have a great team!
- Customer love for the True Link Visa Card, Joseph M., supporting his father with a traumatic brain injury
All quotes refer to the True Link Visa Prepaid Card and the associated True Link Platform provided by True Link Financial, Inc. and not the investment advisory services provided by True Link Financial Advisors, LLC.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61000b6dd512bb24bee0534c/66a8fa5eff84fef93c16e504_Group%208534%402x.png)
## Stay up to date with alerts and purchase history
Real-time alerts help Card Administrators stay informed of recent purchases and view reports of spending history.
[Learn more about True Link for families](https://www.truelinkfinancial.com/</families>)
“
> Your card has been a godsend for me; it’s been a very positive addition to our lives. Everything is easy to use and you have a great team!

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61000b6dd512bb24bee0534c/66c74d298f1b70bfa3635676_Families-1920.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61000b6dd512bb24bee0534c/66a8ef84c05cc823ce1c8dc6_Frame%208514.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61000b6dd512bb24bee0534c/66a8ef96982a0106097b4291_Frame%208516.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61000b6dd512bb24bee0534c/66a8efa901107d273f7ddbd5_Frame%208517.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61000b6dd512bb24bee0534c/66a8efb11f5e5fe5b579ad4c_Frame%208515.png)
## Helping families manage the spending of their loved ones
Provide spending safeguards while empowering a loved one with more financial independence.
[Learn more about True Link for families](https://www.truelinkfinancial.com/</families>)
“
> Your card has been a godsend for me; it’s been a very positive addition to our lives. Everything is easy to use and you have a great team!
- Customer love for the True Link Visa Card, Joseph M., supporting his father with a traumatic brain injury
All quotes refer to the True Link Visa Prepaid Card and the associated True Link Platform provided by True Link Financial, Inc. and not the investment advisory services provided by True Link Financial Advisors, LLC.
### Serving professionals since 2011
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61000b6dd512bb24bee0534c/66a8f4de190b793431721f4c_Group%208489%402x.png)
#### Rep Payees
Distribute funds to Visa cards and skip the hassle of sending checks, plus access built-in reports that help with SSA audits.
[Learn more](https://www.truelinkfinancial.com/</rep-payee-card>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61000b6dd512bb24bee0534c/66a8f57adc20c21ef24c141a_Group%208489%402x.png)
#### Fiduciaries
Conveniently transfer funds for all your clients and track spending with real-time alerts and automated reporting.
[Learn more](https://www.truelinkfinancial.com/</fiduciary-invest>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61000b6dd512bb24bee0534c/66a8f5930795c4864b1ee62c_Group%208489%402x.png)
#### Non-profit Trustees
True Link’s spending rules help empower your clients to live independently while providing transaction-level visibility into spending, built-in reports, and more.
[Learn more](https://www.truelinkfinancial.com/</nonprofit-trustee>)
### True Link Financial Advisors, LLC Investment Management* and Trust Administration
$1 billion in AUM1 managed
17,000+ trustbeneficiaries2
25+ pooledtrusts3 served
[Learn more](https://www.truelinkfinancial.com/</investment-management>)
*Investment Management Services are provided through True Link Financial Advisors, LLC, see footer for additional information.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61000b6dd512bb24bee0534c/66a8fd0371374cbd871421af_Group%208534.png)
## About Us
True Link was created to provide financial solutions to people with complex needs and the people who care for them. We founded the company to make life better for our own loved ones, and are proud to serve vulnerable elders, people with disabilities, and people in recovery – day in and day out.
[Learn more about True Link for families](https://www.truelinkfinancial.com/</about-us>)
“
> Your card has been a godsend for me; it’s been a very positive addition to our lives. Everything is easy to use and you have a great team!
- Customer love for the True Link Visa Card, Joseph M., supporting his father with a traumatic brain injury
All quotes refer to the True Link Visa Prepaid Card and the associated True Link Platform provided by True Link Financial, Inc. and not the investment advisory services provided by True Link Financial Advisors, LLC.
### Learn more about True Link

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61000b6dd512bb24bee0534c/64b8113211a515643fed30fe_Frame%2030.png)
# The True Link Visa® Prepaid Card
Send money, help protect spending, track purchases, get real-time alerts, and more.
[Sign up](https://www.truelinkfinancial.com/<https:/member.truelinkfinancial.com/signups/card/new/survey/entry>)[Request a demo](https://www.truelinkfinancial.com/</demo>)
## One account,two experiences.
The True Link Visa® Prepaid Card helps families and professionals protect the finances of the people they support.
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61000b6dd512bb24bee0534c/64b9396d444763f6f3e53143_green-red-toggles.svg)
### The Card Admin
Fund from an existing bank, monitor transactions, and set spending settings
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61000b6dd512bb24bee0534c/64b93ac0969d2846081b4350_card-lock.svg)
### The Cardholder
Spend where allowed, check balance, view transaction but cannot access settings


## Easy for you to manage, easy for them to use
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61000b6dd512bb24bee0534c/64b93cfd7c588ba71a97ba9a_Spending%20Monitor%201x.png)
## Customizable spending rules
The Card Admin sets where and when the Visa card can be used to make purchases to help protect spending and prevent fraud.
[Learn more](https://www.truelinkfinancial.com/</prepaid-card>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61000b6dd512bb24bee0534c/64b941262ab99af6ea50a681_Spending%20Alerts%202x.png)
## Stay up to date with alerts and purchase history 
Real-time alerts help Card Admins to stay informed of recent purchases and view reports for an overview of spending history.
[Learn more](https://www.truelinkfinancial.com/</families>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61000b6dd512bb24bee0534c/64c296bb826829e08854edd6_home-mobile-card-balance-whole.png)
## Convenient for cardholders
The Visa Card can be used anywhere Visa debit cards are accepted and cardholders can easily make purchases while being protected with no access to funding or spending settings
[Learn more](https://www.truelinkfinancial.com/</prepaid-card>)
## Getting started is easy
### 1. Sign up in 5 minutes
Provide details about yourself and the person you support. 
![Card questionnaire](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61000b6dd512bb24bee0534c/63b88a10648e496c05334160_Card-Getting-Started-1.png)
### 2. Check the mail
The Visa card will typically arrive in the mail within 7-10 business days after an order is placed.
![TrueLink angled card](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61000b6dd512bb24bee0534c/63b88b6680985bbdc9f8d4fe_Card-Getting-Started-2.png)
### 3. Activate and fund
Follow a few simple steps to activate the Visa card and connect an existing bank account to add funds.
![True Link card process](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61000b6dd512bb24bee0534c/63b88ba32a7432cab99ebb91_Card-Getting-Started-3.png)
### 4. Set up spending rules
Customize from over 50 categories, plus the ability to block or allow specific vendors, set cash access, and more.
![Card settings](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61000b6dd512bb24bee0534c/63b88c69763ad7290b901469_Card-Getting-Started-4.png)
### 5. Download the app
Use our mobile app to track spending, send funds, block purchases, and more while on the go.
![preview screenshots](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61000b6dd512bb24bee0534c/63b88c75340bdc0fbb0bf875_Card-Getting-Started-5.png)
[Sign up now](https://www.truelinkfinancial.com/<https:/member.truelinkfinancial.com/signups/card/new/survey/entry>)
## See how it works
[Sign up now](https://www.truelinkfinancial.com/<https:/member.truelinkfinancial.com/signups/card/new/survey/entry>)
## Serving Professionals who support others
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61000b6dd512bb24bee0534c/64b944ad3755794d95dbc00d_home%20rep%20payees.png)
### Rep Payees
Distribute funds to Visa cards and skip the hassle of sending checks, plus access built-in reports that help with SSA audits.
[Learn more](https://www.truelinkfinancial.com/</rep-payee-professional>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61000b6dd512bb24bee0534c/64c28d286f5f034556465f9a_Fid-home-slide-squared.png)
### Fiduciaries
Conveniently transfer funds for all your clients and track spending with real-time alerts and automated reporting.
[Learn more](https://www.truelinkfinancial.com/</fiduciary-professional>)
![Couple smiling at each other](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61000b6dd512bb24bee0534c/62aa36463ab3cd763e0d1a7b_image%20419.png)
### Non-Profit Trustees
True Link’s spending rules help empower your clients to live independently while providing transaction-level visibility into spending, built-in reports, and more.
[Learn more](https://www.truelinkfinancial.com/</nonprofit-trustee>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61000b6dd512bb24bee0534c/64b94875d0817403ed783bd7_pie%20chart.png)
**Investment Management* and****Trust Administration****‍** True Link Financial Advisors, LLC proudly manages more than $1 billion in AUM¹ for 17,000+ trust beneficiaries² and 25+ pooled trusts³.
[Learn more](https://www.truelinkfinancial.com/</investment-management>)
¹Assets under management with True Link Financial Advisors, LLC as of 1/24/2023.²Number of trust beneficiaries served by trusts for which True Link Financial Advisors, LLC serves as investment advisor as of 1/24/2023.³Number of organizations that have pooled trust accounts where True Link Financial Advisors, LLC serves as investment advisor as of 1/24/2023.
## Join our mailing list
Receive the latest updates, information about upcoming events, and more - right to your inbox.

(“True Link Financial” and, together with the Adviser, “True Link”) Registration with the SEC authorities as a Registered Investment Adviser does not imply a certain level of skill or training nor does it constitute an endorsement of the advisory firm by the SEC. Adviser only provides investment management services upon entering into an Investment Advisory Agreement (IAA) with a client. With respect to pooled trust clients, upon entering into an IAA, the client is the trust; beneficiaries of the trust are not investment advisory clients of Adviser. Nothing contained on this website should be considered an offer to sell or a solicitation to buy any securities. Non-deposit investment products and trust services offered by True Link Financial Advisors are not insured or guaranteed by the FDIC or any other government agency, are not obligations of any bank, and are subject to risk, including loss of principal.
True Link Financial, Inc. provides the trust administration software and record-keeping platform as well as the True Link Visa Prepaid Card and associated software platform.‍App Store, Apple and the Apple logo are trademarks of Apple Inc.Google Play and the Google Play Logo are trademarks of Google LLC.
True Link Financial, Inc. does not provide investment management services and neither True Link Financial, Inc. nor True Link Financial Advisors, LLC provides legal or tax advice. Please consult the appropriate advisor regarding your specific circumstances. True Link is not associated or endorsed by the Social Security Administration or any other governmental agency.
True Link Financial, Inc. is a financial technology company and not a bank. Banking services are provided by Sunrise Banks N.A. Your funds are FDIC insured up to $250,000 through Sunrise Banks, N.A., Member FDIC.
The True Link Visa Prepaid Card is issued by Sunrise Banks N.A., St. Paul, MN 55103, Member FDIC, pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. This Card can be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted. Use of this card constitutes acceptance of the terms and conditions stated in the Cardholder Agreement.

# The True Link Visa® Prepaid Card
Send money, help protect spending, track purchases, get real-time alerts, and more.
Sign up⟨23⟩Request a demo⟨1⟩
## One account,two experiences.
The True Link Visa® Prepaid Card helps families and professionals protect the finances of the people they support.
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61000b6dd512bb24bee0534c/64b9396d444763f6f3e53143_green-red-toggles.svg)
### The Card Admin
Fund from an existing bank, monitor transactions, and set spending settings
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61000b6dd512bb24bee0534c/64b93ac0969d2846081b4350_card-lock.svg)
### The Cardholder
Spend where allowed, check balance, view transaction but cannot access settings


## Easy for you to manage, easy for them to use
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61000b6dd512bb24bee0534c/64b93cfd7c588ba71a97ba9a_Spending%20Monitor%201x.png)
## Customizable spending rules
The Card Admin sets where and when the Visa card can be used to make purchases to help protect spending and prevent fraud.
Learn more⟨3⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61000b6dd512bb24bee0534c/64b941262ab99af6ea50a681_Spending%20Alerts%202x.png)
## Stay up to date with alerts and purchase history 
Real-time alerts help Card Admins to stay informed of recent purchases and view reports for an overview of spending history.
Learn more⟨4⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61000b6dd512bb24bee0534c/64c296bb826829e08854edd6_home-mobile-card-balance-whole.png)
## Convenient for cardholders
The Visa Card can be used anywhere Visa debit cards are accepted and cardholders can easily make purchases while being protected with no access to funding or spending settings
Learn more⟨3⟩
## Getting started is easy
### 1. Sign up in 5 minutes
Provide details about yourself and the person you support. 
![Card questionnaire⟨34⟩]
### 2. Check the mail
The Visa card will typically arrive in the mail within 7-10 business days after an order is placed.
![TrueLink angled card⟨35⟩]
### 3. Activate and fund
Follow a few simple steps to activate the Visa card and connect an existing bank account to add funds.
![True Link card process⟨36⟩]
### 4. Set up spending rules
Customize from over 50 categories, plus the ability to block or allow specific vendors, set cash access, and more.
![Card settings⟨37⟩]
### 5. Download the app
Use our mobile app to track spending, send funds, block purchases, and more while on the go.
![preview screenshots⟨38⟩]
Sign up now⟨23⟩
## See how it works
Sign up now⟨23⟩
## Serving Professionals who support others
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61000b6dd512bb24bee0534c/64b944ad3755794d95dbc00d_home%20rep%20payees.png)
### Rep Payees
Distribute funds to Visa cards and skip the hassle of sending checks, plus access built-in reports that help with SSA audits.
Learn more⟨6⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61000b6dd512bb24bee0534c/64c28d286f5f034556465f9a_Fid-home-slide-squared.png)
### Fiduciaries
Conveniently transfer funds for all your clients and track spending with real-time alerts and automated reporting.
Learn more⟨5⟩
![Couple smiling at each other⟨39⟩]
### Non-Profit Trustees
True Link’s spending rules help empower your clients to live independently while providing transaction-level visibility into spending, built-in reports, and more.
Learn more⟨8⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61000b6dd512bb24bee0534c/64b94875d0817403ed783bd7_pie%20chart.png)

generated_description:
True Link is a fintech company founded in 2012 and based in San Francisco. With a mission to provide financial services for caregivers of people with complex needs, True Link was born out of a desire to improve the lives of vulnerable populations, including elders, people with disabilities, and those in recovery. As a participant in Y Combinator’s Batch S13, True Link has rapidly grown to serve over 250,000 families and partnered with more than 300 nonprofits.

At its core, True Link offers tools designed to prevent fraud and protect the spending habits of those under its care. They provide a Visa prepaid card that allows for customizable spending rules, giving caregivers both transparency and control over the financial activities of their loved ones. This way, caregivers can set specific spending limits, receive real-time alerts, and safeguard their loved ones against financial exploitation—a substantial relief for all involved.

True Link has proven its impact, with clients sharing testimonials about how their services have positively transformed family dynamics and protected those who rely on their support. The company employs around 100 people and has accumulated substantial management assets, with over $1 billion managed by its advisory services.

Leadership under Michael Seibel and a commitment to core values drive True Link's mission. Their reputation for quality service is reflected in a remarkable 97% customer recommendation rate, underscoring how they succeed in creating meaningful solutions that foster independence and security for some of society’s most vulnerable members.

You can learn more about True Link and their offerings at [truelinkfinancial.com](https://www.truelinkfinancial.com).
